channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Build up of leaves - blocking drain too, 20th November
item.description:
Large build up of leaves and dirty gutters. Leaves blocking drain too which is regularly over flowing. Needs cleaning ASAP please.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hampden Avenue, Elmers End, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sutherland Road, Edmonton weekly street cleaning missed!, 20th November
item.description:
Unable to put on the Enfield Website as being updated. Weekly street cleaning completely missed again, both sides of Sutherland Road are looking awful. Plenty of wet leaves and litter everywhere, please can we investigate with team as to why the roads are not being cleaned it will be almost a month since anyone has been down here. According to the website the street cleaning is meant to be done Wednesday. Please can we get someone out to clean the roads as soon as possible. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, Sutherland Road, Edmonton, Enfield, London Borough of Enfield
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping of a toilet bowl with (possible) faecal matter still inside, 20th November
item.description:
This dumped toilet bowl has been on Darnley road for a number of days. It appears to have faecal matter still inside and, as such, poses a significant health risk to people and animals in the vicinity. Please remove as a matter of some urgency. Thanks

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Paragon Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Uncollected, 20th November
item.description:
These temporary barriers have been laying across the pavement now for over two weeks. Drop curb installation and contractors have not returned to collect said items. These have a trip hazard for elderly and visually impaired. Please collect asap before there’s an accident.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 336, Old Farm Avenue, Longlands, Sidcup, London Borough of Bexley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water bubbling out of road surface, 20th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmers End, London Borough of Bromley

item.title: Illegal trading, 20th November
item.description:
Mobile mechanic fixing bikes . What is illegal. Also sleeps inside van overnight. What is also illegal checking the government. There is a fine for that and council not doing nothing about it. Should send community wardens there to gather info and then do something about.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fielding Street, Walworth, London Borough of Southwark

item.title: 2 bikes abandoned for months, 20th November
item.description:
Two bikes have been abandoned for months on the bike racks just outside 182 Lower Clapton Road. When the racks are full these two bikes are taking up a locking spot for others to use.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lower Clapton Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
